item.title: WYSIWYG editors for pages inaccessible in the control panel
item.description:
Dec 6, 17:59 PST
Resolved - This issue is resolved. The WYSIWYG editor on website pages should now be accessible.

Dec 6, 17:02 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Dec 6, 15:29 PST
Investigating - The WYSIWYG editor for the content of website pages is currently not accessible in nation control panels. We are investigating this issue.

item.title: Error when clicking send and review on email blasts
item.description:
Dec 4, 16:04 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 4, 15:32 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Dec 4, 15:25 PST
Investigating - We're currently receiving reports that customers are receiving error messages when clicking send and review on email blasts. Our engineers are currently investigating the issue.

item.title: Email blast delays
item.description:
Nov 13, 16:10 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 13, 16:06 PST
Monitoring - We're seeing that the delayed email blasts have now being delivered. We will continue monitor our systems for stability.

Nov 13, 15:43 PST
Investigating - We're currently receiving reports that email blasts are delayed. If you have sent an email blast and would like NationBuilder to cancel the blast, please email help@nationbuilder.com. Our engineers are currently investigating the issue.

item.title: Issues accessing NationBuilder
item.description:
Nov 12, 12:46 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 12, 11:54 PST
Monitoring - Websites and control panels should now be available. Our engineers continue to monitor our systems for stability.

Nov 12, 10:59 PST
Investigating - Customers are experiencing issues accessing their sites and control panel. We are currently investigating.

item.title: Some nations intermittently inaccessible
item.description:
Nov 10, 17:15 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 10, 16:07 PST
Monitoring - Sites and control panels are back up for customers reporting accessibility issues. Our engineering team continues to monitor the situation.

Nov 10, 15:37 PST
Update - Our engineers continue to investigate issues accessing NationBuilder. Websites and control panels may be still be unavailable at this time for some customers.

Nov 10, 14:57 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 10, 14:55 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating issues accessing NationBuilder. Some customers may have issues accessing their control panels and websites at this time.

item.title: Issues with filters and people profiles
item.description:
Nov 4, 13:52 PST
Resolved - Our engineers have implemented the fix. People filter "error running search" errors and 500 errors on profiles have now been resolved. Filters should now be working as expected and profiles can be accessed normally.

Nov 4, 12:35 PST
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Nov 4, 11:57 PST
Identified - Our engineers have identified the issue and currently working on a fix.

Nov 4, 11:45 PST
Investigating - We're observing reports of customers having issues using the people filter feature. When customers run searches, an 'error running search' message may appear, and the filter does not complete. Our engineers are currently investigating this issue.

Additionally, some people profiles may be impacted by these errors. If a people profile is experiencing this issue, a 500 error will be surfaced.

item.title: NationBuilder.com is not accessible
item.description:
Oct 28, 15:17 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 28, 12:55 PDT
Monitoring - We've mitigated the issue with our service provider and NationBuilder.com is now accessible. Our engineers will continue to monitor service. Please email help@nationbuilder.com if you have any further questions.

Oct 28, 12:18 PDT
Identified - We have identified the source of the issue, related to an outage from one of our service providers. Our engineers are working with the provider to restore service.

Oct 28, 11:33 PDT
Investigating - The NationBuilder.com website is currently not available. Our engineers are investigating the issue.

Additionally, if you are trying to create a new trial, you can create a trial directly at:
https://setup.nationbuilder.com/.

In the meantime, if you use NationBuilder.com to login to your nation, this service is not available. Instead, you can login using the following URL: [your-nation-slug].nationbuilder.com/admin.

item.title: Critical database maintenance
item.description:
Sep 20, 16:23 PDT
Resolved - Our engineers have deployed the fix on the critical database. This issue has now been resolved.

Sep 20, 12:02 PDT
Update - While we continue the critical database maintenance, import service is now restored.

Sep 20, 11:22 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Sep 20, 11:18 PDT
Update - We are nearing completion of the critical database maintenance. The tag sharing feature is now available and our team is working to restore the import service. We do not expect any additional disruptions in service or uptime.

Sep 19, 15:58 PDT
Identified - Our engineers are in the process of implementing a fix to the critical customer database. In the meantime, the import and tag share features are not available.

Sep 19, 14:48 PDT
Investigating - Our engineers are investigating issues with a customer database. At the moment, the import and tag share features are unavailable.

item.title: Issues accessing NationBuilder
item.description:

Jul 24, 08:08 PDT

Jul 24, 07:51 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jul 24, 07:41 PDT
Identified - Our engineers are mitigating access issues to customer control panels and websites.

Jul 24, 07:28 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating issues accessing NationBuilder. Some customer may have issues accessing their control panels and websites at this time.

item.title: WYSIWYG content editor is not displaying.
item.description:
Jun 25, 16:57 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 25, 16:57 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 25, 16:49 PDT
Identified - Our engineers are currently implementing a fix. We are monitoring to ensure this update will restore full functionality to all nations, and will update here once everything is complete

Jun 25, 16:27 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating reports that the WYSIWYG content editor is not displaying on all content editor pages. Our engineers are investigating this and we will post an update as soon as possible.

item.title: Some NationBuilder sites and control panels unavailable
item.description:
May 25, 19:48 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 25, 19:13 PDT
Monitoring - All nations are now available. We are continuing to monitor their availability.

May 25, 19:01 PDT
Investigating - We are aware that some customer nations are currently unavailable. Our team are investigating.

item.title: Issues accessing NationBuilder
item.description:
May 20, 18:55 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 20, 18:16 PDT
Monitoring - We're seeing nation availability being restored. Websites and control panels should now be available. Our engineers continue to monitor our systems for stability.

May 20, 17:59 PDT
Investigating - Our engineers have identified intermittent issues accessing NationBuilder. Some NationBuilder control panels and websites may be unavailable at this time.

item.title: Issues accessing NationBuilder
item.description:
May 17, 18:30 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 17, 18:03 PDT
Monitoring - We're seeing nation availability being restored. Websites and control panels should now be available. Our engineers continue to monitor our systems for stability.

May 17, 17:36 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

May 17, 17:32 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

May 17, 17:17 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

May 17, 17:03 PDT
Identified - Our engineers have identified the issue and are currently working on a fix. In the meantime, some customers may still experience issues accessing their NationBuilder control panels and website.

May 17, 16:53 PDT
Investigating - We are seeing issues accessing NationBuilder. Some customer websites and control panels may be unavailable at this time.

item.title: Issues creating and sending emails
item.description:
May 3, 08:47 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 3, 08:20 PDT
Monitoring - Our vendor has confirmed that they've mitigated the underlying issue and that they are no longer seeing errors on their end.

We'll continue to monitor the situation, but please reach out to help@nationbuilder.com if you're still experiencing a problem while creating or sending an email in your control panel.

May 3, 08:01 PDT
Update - We haven't yet received confirmation from our vendor that the underlying issue has been resolved, but we have started to see these errors dissipate for our users.

May 3, 07:24 PDT
Identified - One of our vendors is experiencing a service disruption, which is affecting our users' ability to create and send emails. We're monitoring the situation and will update here when this issue is resolved.

May 3, 07:02 PDT
Investigating - We've received reports of customers experiencing slowness and timeout errors while creating a new email blast, sending 1:1 emails, and accessing their domain settings.

item.title: Issues accessing NationBuilder
item.description:
Apr 27, 21:09 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 27, 20:31 PDT
Monitoring - Our engineering team has taken steps to mitigate downtime for impacted nations, and we are seeing those nations are back up and accessible.

Apr 27, 20:10 PDT
Investigating - We are seeing some customers with issues accessing NationBuilder intermittently. Websites and control panels may be unavailable at this time.

item.description:

Update - Some customers are still experiencing errors when accessing their nation's website and control panel. Our engineering team continues to work towards a resolution.

Apr 27, 07:53 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Apr 27, 07:34 PDT
Identified - We continue to see downtime for some customers. Our engineering team is investigating further.

Apr 27, 07:31 PDT
Monitoring - Sites and control panels are back up for customers reporting accessibility issues. Our engineering team continues to monitor the situation.

Apr 27, 07:24 PDT
Investigating - We are seeing some customers with issues accessing NationBuilder. Websites and control panels may be unavailable at this time. Our engineers are investigating this issue as a top priority.

item.description:
Apr 10, 12:39 PDT
Resolved - A fix has been implemented and the issue has been resolved.

item.title: Issues accessing NationBuilder
item.description:
Mar 28, 05:37 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 27, 15:38 PDT
Monitoring - Our engineers have mitigated the distributed denial of service (DDoS) attack on NationBuilder. Customer nations should be back online. We will continue to monitor our systems to ensure that all our customers remain online.

Mar 27, 13:58 PDT
Update - NationBuilder is currently experiencing a distributed denial of service (DDoS) attack. We are working to mitigate it and ensure that all our customers remain online.

Mar 27, 13:46 PDT
Update - Our engineering team continues to work towards resolving intermittent errors accessing control panels and public-facing websites.

Mar 27, 13:04 PDT
Identified - We've received additional reports that customer websites and control panels are experiencing intermittent errors. Our engineers are working on a resolution.

Mar 27, 12:22 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Mar 27, 11:44 PDT
Identified - Customer nations and websites are still experiencing intermittent errors. Our engineers are working towards a resolution.

Mar 27, 11:23 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Mar 27, 11:19 PDT
Investigating - We are currently observing issues accessing NationBuilder. Websites and control panels may be unavailable at this time. Our engineers are investigating this issue as a top priority.

item.title: Issues with website stylesheets
item.description:
Mar 20, 10:33 PDT
Resolved - This incident is now resolved. If you should any further issues or questions, please email our support team at help@nationbuilder.com.

Mar 20, 10:19 PDT
Monitoring - Our engineers are now observing that website stylesheets are loading and rendering as expected. We'll continue to monitor this issue in the meantime. If you should any questions, please email our support team at help@nationbuilder.com.

Mar 20, 10:12 PDT
Identified - Our engineers have identified an issue with website stylesheets (look and feel of the website) loading as expected. The engineers have deployed a fix. Website stylesheets may be unavailable for a brief period of time, but should start rendering shortly.

item.title: Issues accessing NationBuilder
item.description:
Mar 5, 19:10 PST
Resolved - Our engineers have now restored access to NationBuilder control panels and websites.

Mar 5, 18:23 PST
Identified - Our engineers have identified intermittent issues accessing NationBuilder. Control panel and website access may be unavailable. Our engineers are working on restoring access once again.

Mar 5, 17:37 PST
Monitoring - Our engineers have now restored access to NationBuilder control panels and websites. We continue to mitigate performance delays with NationBuilder features.

Mar 5, 17:21 PST
Identified - Our engineers have now restored access to most NationBuilder control panels and websites. We are still working on restoring full access. In the meantime, some features within NationBuilder may be performing slower than expected.

Mar 5, 16:56 PST
Update - Our engineers continue to investigate issues accessing NationBuilder. Websites and control panels may be unavailable at this time.

Mar 5, 16:37 PST
Investigating - We are currently observing issues accessing NationBuilder. Websites and control panels may be unavailable at this time. Our engineers are investigating this issue.

item.title: Social Share errors between Cloudfront hosted images and Facebook
item.description:
Feb 15, 03:53 PST
Resolved - This issue has now been resolved. Facebook shares are behaving as normal now.

Feb 14, 10:24 PST
Monitoring - Our engineers have made a change to how we serve social share images to Facebook, which should resolve this issue. New shares of NationBuilder pages should render with the appropriate social share image moving forward. Our engineers are continuing to monitor this fix for any issues.

Feb 11, 11:02 PST
Update - Our engineers have determined that the issue with social share images is originating from a recently discovered bug with Facebook. We're working with Facebook to identify and resolve the issue. We will update our status page as soon as we learn more.

Feb 10, 17:49 PST
Investigating - We have had reports that new social share images hosted with Cloudfront are generating errors when creating social share graphic info via Facebook's Debugger.
